short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import social media content into the Astucemedia Data Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Astucemedia Data Platform integrates data with broadcast graphics. Social media content can be curated within the Data Platform and grouped.

This extension allows a user to import social media content from Facebook, Instagram, Threads or Twitter/X into the Data Platform and assign it to an existing group. Clicking on the Astucemedia icon beside beside a post will open a dialog box to import the content.

To use this extension you must have access to an existing Astucemedia Data Platform installation.
